headline: Citi Unveils Citi AI to Enhance Hong Kong Operations
summary: Citigroup Inc. (NYSE:C) is turning to artificial intelligence to enhance internal operations and efficiency. On May 22, the US bank unveiled Citi AI, a new suite of artificial intelligence tools designed to support internal operations in Hong Kong. Employees can use the tool to retrieve vital information from the company’s policy library and create electronic […]

headline: 50 Largest U.S. Banks By Total Assets, Q1 2025
summary: The US banking industry reported a sequential asset increase of 1.8% in the first quarter as banks stockpiled cash and equivalents amid sluggish loan growth.
